name: chlubi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), c1))
-| wcel(c0, csh)
-| wcel(c2, csh)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), c1))
-| wcel(c0, csh)
-| wcel(c2, csh)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

|- wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), c1))
-| wcel(c2, csh)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
-| wcel(c0, cch)

|- wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), c1))
-| wcel(c1, cch)
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c2, cch)

comment: Hilbert lattice join is the least upper bound of two elements. (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
